Infrastructure

Contact us for Infrastructure specialists

GlobalInfrastructure

Infrastructure recruitment and workforce services to work on modern infrastructure

Rapid urbanization, technological advancements and demographic shifts are just a few factors contributing to the world’s increasing demand for modern and powerful infrastructure — with this comes the daunting task of recruiting a talented workforce for your global infrastructure projects.

From conceptual design to final completion, Brunel recruits infrastructure experts for monumental projects worldwide. We pair talent with main contractors, design houses and traditional PCM and EPC projects to build roads, bridges, highways, dams, tunnels and more.

Infrastructure: The Challenge

  • Project demand: Rapid urbanization and technological advancements are driving up demand for new and resilient infrastructure

  • Global demand for skilled talent: Infrastructure projects are becoming larger and more complex than ever before, driving up global demand for top expertise

  • Need for quick workforce access: Rapid industry growth makes it hard to find enough skilled workers in short time frames
  • Finding local talent for global projects: It can be difficult to find the regional workforce you need for local projects
  • Maintaining a safe work environment: Having a strong and unified safety compliance strategy is difficult to achieve worldwide

The Brunel Solution

✔ Local connections: With local relationships, in-country expertise and established offices, we quickly find the local workforce you need

 

✔ High-volume hiring: Fast access to top talent in large numbers

 

✔ Safety and compliance prioritized: With emergency help available 24/7, our HSEQ safety compliance standards give peace of mind

 

✔ Global mobility & visa capabilities: Proven track record of recruiting and placing experts in often challenging nationalities, backed by reputable local partners

 

✔ Remote site services: Unparalleled food, furnished staff accommodation and site transportation services even in the most remote locations— including building full campsites at worksites 

We are one of the World's Best Companies 2024

We are proud that Brunel has been named one of the “World’s Best Companies 2024” by TIME magazine and Statista. This recognition, based on rigorous criteria including employee satisfaction, revenue growth, and ESG performance, highlights our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. It sets us apart in our industry, enhancing our reputation and fostering trust and loyalty among our clients and specialists.
